remarks: Distributive law for inner product subtraction.  (Contributed by NM, 20-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Oct-2015.)
statement:
phlsrng.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
phllmhm.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
phllmhm.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
ipsubdir.m $e |- .- = ( -g ` W ) $.
ipsubdir.s $e |- S = ( -g ` F ) $.
ipsubdi $p |- ( ( W e. PreHil /\ ( A e. V /\ B e. V /\ C e. V ) ) -> ( A ., ( B .- C ) ) = ( ( A ., B ) S ( A ., C ) ) ) $.
